reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's color, particularly the yellow shade, and appreciate its style, with one noting it looks hand-knit in a cool way. Customers describe it as thick, though opinions about the fit are mixed, with some finding it perfect while others note the armpits are tight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, comfy sweater!
items.body: I love this cardigan sweater! It is literally perfect! The perfect length, goes down to your waist. It’s soft and warm, with the most perfect shade of yellow! It’s not like an overwhelming color of yellow it’s very soft and neutral. You can style it by dressing it up or dressing it down with a simple pair of jeans. I washed it, but air dried it so it wouldn’t shrink. Read more
items.author: Giana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT
items.body: Super soft and great quality, the sweater is thick and warm. The grey is a perfect light grey color. I would get in literally every color if I could. I’m 5ft and around 110 lbs, it fits great and I got an xs. Read more
items.author: Americus

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but doesn’t wash well
items.body: This sweater is so cute. It is thick but not bulky and so comfortable. However, it did not wash well and had pills after one wash. I loved it so much, I would buy again, though! Read more
items.author: Mackenzie May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars the most perfect cardigan!!
items.body: LITERALLY SO PERFECT! I love a chunky, oversized sweater! the color is perfection (i got yellow and red) The material isn't too thick or thin. I will wear with EVERYTHING! Read more
items.author: Reese Bryans

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars decent
items.body: I purchased this red cardigan because I loved the color and simple design. The material is soft, but it’s thinner than I expected, so it’s not very warm for colder weather. The fit was fine, though it ran slightly small—if you’re between sizes, definitely size up. After one wash, I noticed a bit of pilling, which was disappointing. It’s an okay addition to my wardrobe, but I probably wouldn’t repurchase. Read more
items.author: annette G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic
items.body: This sweater is adorable. I am 5'5 a 36C about 134. The buttons are secured. The sweater is soft and a bit fuzzy in good ways and super comfortable. Hits on my belt line. I am high waisted so not cropped on me. Well made! I have this in yellow and it looks like the picture shown. Just not so baggy on the bent arm. Happy shopping. Read more
items.author: Nancy Razim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering, high quality sweater.
items.body: High quality, soft cardigan. I get so many compliments! Looks great with bootcut jeans and heeled booties. I bet it would be great with wide leg jeans too. Read more
items.author: Marissa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Yellow coded faded after washing
items.body: Yellow was beautiful but completely faded after washing! :( Read more
items.author: Jennifer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Navy, Pink, Beige, Blue, Yellow, Darkblue, Black, Darkred, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
